about_the_game:
Main components of Lords of the Void Demo version:

  • two of the four factions available in the full version

  • one campaign that contains three tutorial missions (full version has four campaigns of five missions) 

  • five scenarios, from 1 to 5 players, with an option of local multiplayer (full version includes more missions and a map editor)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 24.04 LTS release or latest
  • Processor: i5 Dual Core or Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full OpenGL 3.3 support (Example: Intel HD Graphics 2500 (Ivy Bridge), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri))
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support (Example: Intel HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri))
